name: insatiably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is too great to be satisfied: He was just a young man, insatiably curious about the world. The children were insatiably eager for excitement. See
insatiable
More examplesFewer examplesInsatiably greedy businesses were gaining yet greater profit margins with lower production costs.He was mad about drawing; he drew everything in sight, insatiably.She was insatiably hungry for attention.
